questions: Is there an image of a character whose aura is being graded? Answer with yes or no.
Is the image cropped to the size of a real card? Answer with yes or no.
Does the label at the top have the title 'GNRLYXYZ'? Answer with yes or no.
Is '1/1' displayed directly below 'GNRLYXYZ' on the label? Answer with yes or no.
Is there a barcode placed beneath the '1/1'? Answer with yes or no.
Is the grade label displayed on the right side of the label at the top? Answer with yes or no.
Is the numeric grade from the scale displayed below the grade label? Answer with yes or no.
Is the certification number displayed below the numeric grade? Answer with yes or no.
Is all text on the label uniform in size? Answer with yes or no.
Is there balanced padding from the border for all text on the label? Answer with yes or no.
Is the display placed on a white background? Answer with yes or no.
Is the full display shown without any text or labels on the card? Answer with yes or no.
model_output:
yes - The character's aura, indicated by the light rays, is being graded.
no - The image is not cropped to the size of a real card; it shows the entire card and additional border.
no - The title on the label is 'GNRLXYXX', not 'GNRLYXYZ'.
no - '1/1' is not displayed directly below 'GNRLYXYZ'; instead, 'GEMT 10' is shown.
no - There is no barcode beneath '1/1' because '1/1' is not present.
yes - The numeric grade 'GEMT 10' is on the right side of the label at the top.
no - There is no numeric grade displayed below the grade label.
no - There is no certification number displayed below the numeric grade.
no - The text on the label is not uniform in size; different elements use different font sizes.
no - There is no balanced padding from the border for all text on the label; text placement varies.
no - The display is not placed on a white background; it is on a pinkish gradient background.
no - Text and labels are present on the card; the image is not of a card without text or labels.
